snippet: The Museum of Modern Art plans to mount an exhibition of Picasso sculptures, with substantial loans from the Picasso Museum in Paris.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Museum of Modern Art will mount exhibit of Picasso sculptures in 2015; Clark Art Institute in Williamstown, Mass, is gifted rare Winslow Homer portrait of a boy; water tower installation made from recycled materials by artist Tom Fruin is featured in Brookyn Bridge Park; former Christie's dealer Guy Bennett is hired as director of collections and acquisitions for Qatar Museums.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Modern Art plans to mount an exhibition of Picasso sculptures, with substantial loans from the Picasso Museum in Paris.
